titles.title: Recognizing and congratulating Northeastern University on its one-hundredth anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 10/9/1997--Introduced. Congratulates Northeastern University in Boston, Massachusetts, on its 100th anniversary.
